meanings.definition: The act of riding a bicycle.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy biking in the park on weekends.
meanings.sent2: Biking is a fun way to stay active and explore nature.
meanings.sent3: Biking with friends always brings laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her love for biking knows no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The freedom of biking under the clear blue sky is unmatched.

meanings.definition: The sport or activity of riding a bicycle.
meanings.sent1: Competing in biking races requires skill and endurance.
meanings.sent2: Biking enthusiasts often gather to share tips and stories.
meanings.sent3: The biking competition was intense but exciting.
meanings.sent4: In the world of biking, every turn is a new adventure.
meanings.sent5: His passion for biking shines through in every race he joins.

meanings.sent1: I love biking through the countryside on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: She bikes to work every morning to avoid traffic.
meanings.sent3: Biking around the neighborhood makes errands more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: He bikes for miles without getting tired.
meanings.sent5: Biking along the riverbank soothes his mind after a long day.
